title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; identical API surface to the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: First-party LangChain integration; drop-in LLM, embeddings, and tool-calling support via Ollama.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file upload, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with chat history, model switching, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension powered by Ollama; local, private code completions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma; ingest PDFs and chat over them.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API that exposes Ollama endpoints with token-based auth and rate limits.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service that adds OpenAI-compatible chat/completions and embeddings endpoints on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-modal
summary: Run Ollama on Modal serverless GPUs; pay-per-second scaling for batch or chat workloads.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Slack bot that answers questions via Ollama with thread support and per-channel model selection.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot with group chat, voice-to-text, and inline query support backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings and strong types for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client generated from OpenAPI specs; idiomatic contexts and error handling.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot supporting slash commands, conversation memory, and optional image generation via llava.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official Ollama JavaScript package downloaded 200k+ times; zero dependencies, full API coverage.
